org.opensaml.saml.metadata.resolver.impl

Class BasicRoleDescriptorResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractInitializableComponent
      • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractIdentifiedInitializableComponent
        • org.opensaml.saml.metadata.resolver.impl.BasicRoleDescriptorResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.Component, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.DestructableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.IdentifiedComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.InitializableComponent, net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.Resolver<RoleDescriptor,net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.CriteriaSet>, RoleDescriptorResolver
    Deprecated. 
    use PredicateRoleDescriptorResolver

    @Deprecated
public class BasicRoleDescriptorResolver
extends net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.component.AbstractIdentifiedInitializableComponent
implements RoleDescriptorResolver
    Simple impl of RoleDescriptorResolver which wraps an instance of MetadataResolver to support basic EntityDescriptor resolution, and then performs further role-related filtering over the returned EntityDescriptor.

protected List<RoleDescriptor> getRole(@Nullable

                                                           throws net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException
        Deprecated. 
        Get role descriptors for a given entityID and role.
        Parameters:
        entityID - entityID to lookup
        roleName - role to lookup
        Returns:
        list of roles
        Throws:
        net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException - if an error occurs

      • doGetRole

        @Nonnull
 @NonnullElements
protected List<RoleDescriptor> doGetRole(@Nullable
                                                                    String entityID,
                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                    QName roleName)
                                                             throws net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the identified roles from an EntityDescriptor. This method should not check if the provider is initialized, if arguments are null, if the roles are valid, etc. All of this is done by the invoker of this method.
        Parameters:
        entityID - ID of the entity from which to retrieve the roles, never null
        roleName - name of the roles to search for, never null
        Returns:
        the modifiable list of identified roles or an empty list if no roles exists
        Throws:
        net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException - thrown if there is a problem searching for the roles

      • doGetEntityDescriptor

        protected EntityDescriptor doGetEntityDescriptor(String entityID)
                                          throws net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException
        Deprecated. 
        Resolve an entity descriptor based on entityID using the wrapped metadata resolver.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entityID of the EntityDescriptor to resolve.
        Returns:
        the resolved EntityDescriptor, or null if not found
        Throws:
        net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException - if there is a problem resolving the EntityDescriptor

protected RoleDescriptor getRole(@Nullable

                                    throws net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException
        Deprecated. 
        Get role descriptor for a given entityID and role and protocol.
        Parameters:
        entityID - entityID to lookup
        roleName - role to lookup
        supportedProtocol - protocol to lookup
        Returns:

      • doGetRole

        protected RoleDescriptor doGetRole(String entityID,
                                   QName roleName,
                                   String supportedProtocol)
                            throws net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the role which supports the given protocol.
        Parameters:
        entityID - ID of the entity from which to retrieve roles, never null
        roleName - name of the role to search for, never null
        supportedProtocol - protocol to search for, never null
        Returns:
        the role supporting the protocol or null if no such role exists
        Throws:
        net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.resolver.ResolverException - thrown if there is a problem search for the roles

      • isValid

        protected boolean isValid(org.opensaml.core.xml.XMLObject descriptor)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns whether the given descriptor is valid. If valid metadata is not required this method always returns true.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - the descriptor to check
        Returns:
        true if valid metadata is not required or the given descriptor is valid, false otherwise
